sentences.en: Adopt the engineering plastics, the surface is smooth, esthetic and magnificent.
sentences.cn: 主体采用阻燃工程塑料, 表面光滑 、 美观气派.

sentences.en: Different models of abstract criticism make different types of esthetic narration.
sentences.cn: 不同的抽象批判样式构成了不同的美学叙事.

sentences.en: He despised the esthetic of minimalism.
sentences.cn: 他鄙视极简主义的审美观.

sentences.en: It was also a work with a self - confident esthetic style.
sentences.cn: 它形成了自身鲜明的美学品格.

sentences.en: My appreciation and enjoyment of art are esthetic rather than intellectual.
sentences.cn: 我对艺术的欣赏和享受来自于感觉,而不是智力.

sentences.en: Objective : To explore the relation of gingivoplasty and esthetic dentistry.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨牙龈成形外科与美容牙科的关系.

sentences.en: Pointed out the contradictions of the poetic theory and the esthetic interest.
sentences.cn: 指出施闰章的诗学理论与审美趣味的矛盾.

sentences.en: Preserves the esthetic interest and so on.
That armchair is comfortable but not very esthetic.
sentences.cn: 那张扶手椅坐起来舒服，但不太美观。

sentences.en: The construction and conception of esthetic divinity needs to raise the modem scientific spirit.
sentences.cn: 审美神性的建构需要培养现代科学精神.
在美学上追求标题性构思.

sentences.en: The new esthetic spirit emphasized science , democracy, nationalism and popularization.
sentences.cn: 新的美学精神以科学化 、 主化 、 族化和大众化为特征.

sentences.en: The paper also discusses principles and methods in esthetic education.
sentences.cn: 美育在育,要通过日常生活、会自然和音乐、术、蹈、学、视等各种艺术教育手段践行提高.

sentences.en: This literary phenomenon was affected by the social morals and esthetic ideas at that time.
sentences.cn: 这一文学现象与清代杜会风气与清人审美观念有关.

sentences.en: Thus, most East Asian artist have appreciated the esthetic value of calligraphy.
sentences.cn: 因此, 大多数东亚艺术家都很重视书法的美学价值.

words.tran_cn: 美学；审美家；唯美主义者
